ojc.ahni.util

Class PostProcess

  • java.lang.Object
    • ojc.ahni.util.PostProcess

  • public class PostProcess
extends java.lang.Object
    Contains utility methods to perform post-processing on the results of a run or multiple runs.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors

      PostProcess() 

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static void compressAverage(java.io.BufferedReader resultsReader, java.io.BufferedWriter resultsWriter, int size)
      Given a comma-separated list of fitness or performance results for each generation, compute the average over some window and create a new file consisting of these averages.
      static void process(java.lang.String[] argsArray)
      Utility method to process command line arguments, set-up file IO, and call required post-processing method.

      • compressAverage

        public static void compressAverage(java.io.BufferedReader resultsReader,
                   java.io.BufferedWriter resultsWriter,
                   int size)
                            throws java.io.IOException
        Given a comma-separated list of fitness or performance results for each generation, compute the average over some window and create a new file consisting of these averages.
        Parameters:
        resultsReader - input stream to read data from file containing the original results.
        resultsWriter - output stream to write generated data.
        size - the desired size of the output file (number of results). The window size is then computed as ([number of original generations] / size).
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
